Uses of Class
org.dvb.io.persistent.FileAccessPermissions

  • Packages that use FileAccessPermissions 
    Package Description
    org.dvb.io.persistent
    Provides extensions to the java.io package for access to files held in persistent storage.
    org.ocap.storage
    The org.ocap.storage package represents storage devices.

    • Uses of FileAccessPermissions in org.dvb.io.persistent

      Methods in org.dvb.io.persistent that return FileAccessPermissions 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      FileAccessPermissions FileAttributes.getPermissions()
      Returns the file access permissions
      Methods in org.dvb.io.persistent with parameters of type FileAccessPermissions 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void FileAttributes.setPermissions(FileAccessPermissions p)
      Sets the file access permissions.

    • Uses of FileAccessPermissions in org.ocap.storage

      Subclasses of FileAccessPermissions in org.ocap.storage 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  ExtendedFileAccessPermissions
      This class extends FileAccessPermissions to let granting applications provide read and write file access to applications that have an organisation identifier different from a granting application.
